timeline.bodyText: If you want to remove it, for me it's fine, but my previous understanding is that this was "by design" of codegenerators? possibly @evacchi and @mariofusco can better advise here.

replies.bodyText: if it never throws, I guess it's ok to drop that. I don't have a strong opinion there :)
